caption.center: JOSEPH E. GONSALVES v. JAMES W. MULLEN, Warden.

opinion.posture: Respondent directed to file his answer to petition for habeas corpus and to show cause, if any, why the writ should not issue as prayed, said answer to be made in compliance with the provisions of Rule 14.
opinion.attorneys:
William F. Reilly, Public Defender, PaulE. Kelley, Asst. Public Defender, for petitioner.
Richard J. Israel, Attorney General, for respondent.
